Billowbarrow

Locations

Oilfield town at the center of early campaign conflict.

Session notes describe economic decline, faction violence, Fair Day upheaval, and large-scale destruction following industrial magic events.

See: Session 1 - 2/3/2025, Session 3 - 3/3/2025, Session 4 - 3/17/2024.
